snippet: Like everyone else, Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella can't explain Brazil's collapse to lose 7-1 to Germany in the semifinals of its home World Cup....

headline.print_headline: Argentina Coach Re Brazil: Football Is Illogical
headline.main: Argentina Coach Re Brazil: Football Is Illogical

lead_paragraph: Like everyone else, Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella can't explain Brazil's collapse to lose 7-1 to Germany in the semifinals of its home World Cup.
